name: Blocks Shoot
description:
"Blocks Shoot" is a physics game where you must throw off green blocks down.
For each thrown block you takes the points. You must take 100+ points to win in level. Use different balls to do it. Each ball has the unique feature.
This addicting game requires skill, patience and a lot of free time.

How to play:
- Pick a ball
- Press in the attack area
- Drag your finger
- Shoot the ball and push the green blocks down

The main features:
- Completely free of charge game;
- Use of physics engine for the balls motion;
- 45+ levels to pass;
- 4 different balls with unique features;
- 9 bonus levels;
- New levels are constantly added.
